April 15, 1978 D Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest huddersfield-district-bba-spring-contest-3671
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and trophy, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 10, 2013, 12:50 p.m. June 22, 2016, 10:21 a.m.
1 Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside The Three Musketeers
2 Thurlstone Brass Band Eric Crossley Scheherazade
3 Clifton and Lightcliffe Band James Hickman Divertimento [Kelly]
4 Honley Silver Band T. Webster Snowdon Fantasy
5 Emley Brass Band Charlie Westerby Snowdon Fantasy
Withdrawn Leeds City Fred Argyle
